title: MD
biography: S N Balakrishnan was the second Chancellor of Shiv Nadar University and the Chairperson of the Executive Council, the apex statutory body at the University. His brother, Shiv Nadar, is the founder of the university bearing his name.
aiSummary: N. Balakrishnan is a medicine specialist with an H-index of 82 at Bioinformatics (Member). Has been published in Probability in the Engineering and Informational Sciences. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
